snippet: The Egyptian government has acknowledged killing 36 Islamists in its custody on Sunday, and an attack by suspected militants in the Sinai peninsula left at least 24 police officers dead.
abstract: The Egyptian government has acknowledged killing 36 Islamists in its custody on Sunday, and an attack by suspected militants in the Sinai peninsula left at least 24 police officers dead.

byline.original: By LIAM STACK and ROBERT MACKEY

headline.main: Egyptians Share Gruesome Images of Dead Prisoners and Soldiers
